app.resume.general.working_model_overlin: Remote work is a great idea
app.resume.general.about_me: Specialist. Focused on development for over 17 years. Controls hardware with low-level technologies, surprises with elegant high-end desktop, web and mobile solutions. Quick reasoning, identifies and solves problems in a sustainable way. Always focused on quality, it guarantees easy maintenance and evolution of complex long-term solutions.
app.resume.expertise.title: Expertise
app.resume.work_experiences.title: Professional experience
app.resume.work_experience.berners.descr:
- Análise e desenvolvimento de produto
- Desenvolvimento full stack de solução para controle de hardware produzido pela empresa.
app.resume.work_experience.sofashion.des:
- Team leader in the development and implementation of e-commerce (web).
- API development for communication between web and mobile system.
- Contributed in the development of e-commerce application (Android).
- Consultant at information security area.
app.resume.work_experience.stefanini.des:
- Allocated in the Medical Area sector at Unimed-Rio, I was responsible for developing and maintaining essential systems for medical care, a web solution with more than 20,000 daily accesses.
- Responsible for major changes in the sector, such as restructuring and important implementations in the main system.
- Adjustment of the system to the standards imposed by the National Health Agency, such as communication between Unimed x ANS.
- Development of a solution responsible for communication between Unimed's in other states of the country, a service that processes more than 100 thousand daily requests.
app.resume.work_experience.ambidados.des:
- Founder, leader and main developer of an important tool for the Meteorology and Oceanography sector at Petrobras, capable of reducing response time by up to 30% in the processing and analysis of large data shipments. Development system to run as a service, processes highly complex mathematical calculations and performs an average of 15 million SQL statements per day.
- Migration of high complexity mathematical calculation technologies.
- Gave lectures on software development for scientists, data analysts and other programmers.
app.resume.projects.title: Projects
app.resume.project.proxy.title: WE
app.resume.project.proxy.description:
Hardware and software development for a 4G proxy server.
The equipment consists of a modified microcomputer and some manageable electronic components.
Talking about software, a solution that provides a Restful API and a web app to control the hardware, such as routing IPs, filters, IPv4 and IPv6 proxy, Socks4 and Socks5, routes, plugins for different models of modems and cell phones, user control, bandwidth control, SMS management, and others.

app.resume.project.truecaller.descriptio: Identifier and blocker of unwanted calls and messages for cell phones.
